name: rebase
description: Rebase pull requests in a repository

scripts.build-checkout: rm -rf node_modules/checkout/package-lock.json;yarn install --cwd node_modules/checkout --prefer-offline && yarn --cwd node_modules/checkout run build
scripts.postversion: echo 'Running post versioning commands';git push --tags && git push && echo "Successfully released version $npm_package_version!"
scripts.generate-docs: echo 'Generating docs';if [ ! -f 'lib/misc/generate-docs.js' ];then yarn run build;fi; node -e "require('./lib/misc/generate-docs.js').updateUsage(actionReference='peter-evans/rebase@v' + require('./package.json').version.toString())" && sed -i "s|peter-evans/rebase@\(.*\)\$|peter-evans/rebase@$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version")|g" README.md;git add README.md

author: Peter Evans
